record.dc:title: The McCarter Girls, all in our school but the youngest
record.dc:description: Those pictured (back row, left to right) are teacher Ruth Sturley, Birthana? McCarter, Cora McCarter, and Polly McCarter. The two young McCarter girls in the front row are not identified. The two youngest girls are in photo 3 on page 32, entitled Watermelon Enroute to Red Top and The Glades.
